OOC I'll see your ploy and raise you a blast.

BIC Prebon  knows that Astral is just a distraction and instead fires 
five blasts at Starlight. The trainer leader knows the price that 
Zardus would dish out for failure wouldn't be pleasant so the new bot 
would be priority for both Astral and Starlight. shoot down the one 
carrying the bot and the other one would have to take over.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Astral/Starlight::
> 
> Astral picks up the new bot and hands him to Starlight. "Here fly 
him 
> to Zardus, I'll take care of the battle."
> 
> Starlight nods, taking the bot and launching off, heading for the 
> Iron Fist, which was three miles away and would take a little while 
> to get to.
> 
> Astral looks around, his scanners searching for enemies. He spots 
> Prebon, jogging off toward the bot's location, ready to be shot at.
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > Prebon followed the two alliance bots to the crash site, he 
decided 
> > that it would be the chance to replenish his troops. when he got 
> > close enough he saw the big picture. In order to carry the new 
bot 
> > into the Iron fist they'd have to drop the shields and open the 
> door. 
> > He sat back and waited for the golden moment
